messages.name: lil' clucker
messages.text: Just type your message in the box at the top, and when you hit return it will show up as a new message at the bottom!

messages.name: Cluck boy
messages.text: To remove your message, click the delete button next to your message

messages.name: Cluck Daddy
messages.text: If you want to clear all messages, click the 'clear messages' button next to the text box

messages.name: cluckMe
messages.text: Try it out and enjoy uClucker!
